main event: Twelve objects were observed in the sky above Comfort, Texas, on December 8, 1957.
interesting points: The objects were compared to the size of a pin head and described as bright lights,The observer initially thought they were stars,The objects stood still during the observation period of 10 minutes,There were suggestions that the objects could be parachutes or weather instruments from balloons,No unusual sightings were captured on radar during the incident.
sighted object: twelve bright lights in the sky
witness description: Civilian who thought the objects were stars initially
